医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人工智能工具追踪突变以预测下一波新冠病毒变异波AI 模型可以预测哪些 SARS-CoV-2 变体可能引发新一波感染。当前用于预测病毒传播动态的模型不能预测变体特异性传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240102/AI-tool-tracks-mutations-to-predict-next-COVID-variant-wave.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240102/AI-tool-tracks-mutations-to-predict-next-COVID-variant-wave.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=595d774a-6d1a-4b0a-a383-4866c4c7f63a Tue, 02 Jan 2024 10:17:58 -0500 AI tool tracks mutations to predict next COVID variant wave
鱼和坚果中的健康脂肪可能会减缓肺部疤痕，延迟移植坚果和鱼中发现的健康脂肪能否减缓可能致命的肺部疤痕（即肺纤维化）的进展，并推迟肺移植的需要？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240102/Healthy-fats-from-fish-and-nuts-may-slow-lung-scarring-delay-transplants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240102/Healthy-fats-from-fish-and-nuts-may-slow-lung-scarring-delay-transplants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b87504e9-8382-4792-b6b1-8ab93e813ec5 Tue, 02 Jan 2024 10:07:00 -0500 Healthy fats from fish and nuts may slow lung scarring, delay transplants
研究揭示了将感知信息转移到记忆的新型神经编码机制我们的记忆细节丰富：我们可以生动地回忆起我们家的颜色、厨房的布局，或者我们最喜欢的咖啡馆的前面。大脑如何编码这些信息长期以来一直困扰着神经科学家。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240102/Study-reveals-novel-neural-coding-mechanism-for-transferring-perceptual-information-to-memory.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240102/Study-reveals-novel-neural-coding-mechanism-for-transferring-perceptual-information-to-memory.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df17426e-87f6-4ea2-87b1-cf39d2139abf Tue, 02 Jan 2024 09:38:23 -0500 Study reveals novel neural coding mechanism for transferring perceptual information to memory
青少年肥胖会增加年轻时患早期慢性肾病的风险新研究发现，青少年肥胖会显着增加年轻时患早期慢性肾病的风险。即使那些体重指数正常较高的人也面临风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240102/Adolescent-obesity-heightens-the-risk-of-early-chronic-kidney-disease-in-young-adulthood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240102/Adolescent-obesity-heightens-the-risk-of-early-chronic-kidney-disease-in-young-adulthood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4bd5344-2f0c-42a5-9480-ac8eb1c83375 Tue, 02 Jan 2024 09:24:00 -0500 Adolescent obesity heightens the risk of early chronic kidney disease in young adulthood
小分子可切换 RNA 平台能够控制治疗蛋白的表达就像医生根据患者的需要调整药物剂量一样，治疗基因的表达（通过基因疗法在人体内进行修饰以治疗或治愈疾病）也需要维持在治疗窗口内。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240102/Small-molecule-switchable-RNA-platform-enables-control-of-therapeutic- Protein-express.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240102/Small-molecule-switchable-RNA-platform-enables-control-of-therapeutic- Protein-express.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28b92ee7-0586-41be-9521-39f1f4a9f840 Tue, 02 Jan 2024 06:27:06 -0500 Small molecule-switchable RNA platform enables control of therapeutic protein expression
一种蛋白质被认为是保持细胞整洁的关键因素正如健康的器官对我们的健康至关重要一样，健康的细胞器对细胞的正常运作也至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240102/A- Protein-identified-as-key-player-in-keeping-cells-tidy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240102/A- Protein-identified-as-key-player-in-keeping-cells-tidy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60791c9a-8524-488d-b901-a1478db8ef58 Tue, 02 Jan 2024 06:08:01 -0500 A protein identified as key player in keeping cells tidy
美国农村的儿童保育差距可能会削弱小社区的能力Candy Murnion 清楚地记得促使她在约旦开设第一家日托业务的事件，约旦是蒙大拿州东部草原上一个只有不到 400 名居民的小镇。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240102/Child-care-gaps-in-rural-America-threaten-to-undercut-small-communities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240102/Child-care-gaps-in-rural-America-threaten-to-undercut-small-communities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84bbad1c-1f55-460b-9351-c4afe622e586 Tue, 02 Jan 2024 05:50:36 -0500 Child care gaps in rural America threaten to undercut small communities
靶向眼部光谱为视网膜健康带来新的曙光研究证明了靶向眼部荧光光谱分析眼底的有效性，为眼部疾病的诊断和治疗提供了潜在的进步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240101/Targeted-eye-spectroscopy-shines-new-light-on-retinal-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240101/Targeted-eye-spectroscopy-shines-new-light-on-retinal-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd6435e9-7635-41b1-9be9-71d77357c483 Mon, 01 Jan 2024 18:14:00 -0500 Targeted ocular spectroscopy shines new light on retinal health
免疫细胞如何塑造我们最早的呼吸研究描述了胚胎和胎儿阶段人类肺部免疫细胞的发育，揭示了它们对上皮细胞命运和肺部发育的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240101/How-immune-cells-shape-our-earliest-breaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240101/How-immune-cells-shape-our-earliest-breaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a9171c8-39a4-4a6f-8e17-e8800d4bcb2f Mon, 01 Jan 2024 18:02:00 -0500 How immune cells shape our earliest breaths
研究显示职业倦怠和职业不满促使医生离开他们的诊所研究调查了医生中职业倦怠、职业成就感和离职意愿的普遍情况，揭示了性别、年龄、种族和专业之间的显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240101/Study-reveals-burnout-and-professional-dissatisfaction-driven-practices-to-leave-their-practices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240101/Study-reveals-burnout-and-professional-dissatisfaction-having-their-practices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e24b68b9-efc4-49bd-a876-d741d916ddc2 Mon, 01 Jan 2024 17:51:00 -0500 Study reveals burnout and professional dissatisfaction driving physicians to leave their practices
